vendor_name: Ramada Suites By Wyndham Wailoaloa Beach Fiji
title: Grand Opening Beachfront Escape
description: Having opened only three months ago, the brand new Ramada Suites By Wyndham Wailoaloa Beach Resort Fiji brings a fresh, all-suite escape to the shores of Nadi. Set your watch to island time and escape to the azure waters of the South Pacific with a five or seven-night stay with two massages to share, return airport transfers, welcome bottle of wine on arrival, complimentary Wi-Fi and more. Plus, package options for two kids to stay and eat free are available!
location_description: Ramada Suites By Wyndham Wailoaloa Beach Resort Fiji
offer_address: Wailoaloa Road, Nadi Bay Nadi, Nadi, Fiji

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Fiji Nadi Bay Resort & Spa
title: Ultra-Chic Beachfront Spa Retreat on Nadi Bay with Seven Restaurants & Bars
description: The Crowne Plaza Fiji Nadi Bay Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel, is where bamboo-lined luxury meets the tropical shores of Wailoaloa Beach and Nadi Bay. This Fijian paradise is a gateway to the azure waters of the Mamanuca Islands, and a stone's throw from the vibrant Nadi Town Market. Indulge in the resort's sprawling spa, savour the exquisite fusion of local and international cuisine over seven restaurants and bars, including a stunning beach club, and marvel at breathtaking sunsets from every corner.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Fiji Nadi Bay Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1 & 2 Nadi Bay Road, Wailoaloa Beach, Nadi, Fiji

title: Contemporary Fiji Hideaway with Enviable Location near Nadi International Airport
description: For a stay that's equal parts convenient and relaxing, Tokatoka Resort by Warwick Hotels and Resorts takes the cake. Located nearby Fiji's International Airport in Nadi, it's the perfect spot to rest between long flights or island adventures. Nestled within lush, manicured gardens with a tranquil looped swimming pool and a fun waterslide for the kids, it's an easy win for relaxing and recharging. At the onsite Kanavata restaurant and bar, order mouthwatering dishes like surf and turf or the curry of the day alongside a refreshing drink. If it's a pre or post-flight massage you're after, Tokatoka Spa offers a range of rejuvenating treatments to ease tight muscles. You'll never be late for your flight, with the airport located just across the road. How easy is that!

title: Nadi City Centre Hotel near Airport with Onsite Pool & Restaurant
description:
Situated in the heart of bustling Nadi town, this charming retreat offers a tranquil oasis, with lush gardens and a refreshing swimming pool. Explore the vibrant local markets, brimming with fresh produce and artisan crafts, or take a short drive to the stunning Wailoaloa Beach.

Savour the flavours of Fiji at Rokete Restaurant and Bar, where you can enjoy local dishes and refreshing drinks while soaking in the serene garden views, or breathe in the smell of flowers during treatments at the onsite spa.
offer_address: Nadi Airport, Queens Road, Nadi, Fiji

title: Tropical Fiji Garden Retreat near Denarau Island & Nadi Airport
description:
Bask in heavenly island luxury at this Novotel gem, set on 42 acres of tropical gardens, with every room overlooking the golf course and verdant green surrounds. Let serenity wash over you by the sparkling outdoor pool or indulge in alfresco dining with a pina colada at Talei Restaurant and Bar.

Just five minutes from the airport and a 20-minute drive from the picturesque Denarau Island, you're within easy reach of natural gems and local attractions alike. Take a trip to the Garden of the Sleeping Giant and marvel at the incredible array of Asian Orchids, or explore the Coral Coast before returning to relax in your contemporary room.
offer_address: Namaka Hill, Nadi Airport, Nadi, Fiji
